articles.title: DPRK Delegation Clarifies Its Stand at Geneva Disarmament Conference
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Clarifies Its Stand at Geneva Disarmament Conference
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation clarified the following principled stand as regards the recent two successful test-launches of ICBM Hwasong-14 at the third session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on August 9:
					 The DPRK's access to the strongest nuclear force is a fair and legitimate measure for self-defense to protect the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence from the high-handed and arbitrary acts of the U.S. which has made it its business to pursue the policy of extreme hostility and pose nuclear threat to the DPRK for over half a century.
					
					 The successive test-launch of ICBM by the DPRK was a stern warning to the U.S. which wages reckless and perilous military provocation and despicable campaign of sanctions on the DPRK.
					
					 As long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat continue, the DPRK, no matter who may say what, will never place its self-defensive nuclear deterrence on the negotiating table nor flinch an inch from the road chosen by itself, the road of bolstering up the state nuclear force.
					
					 Now that the U.S. revealed its vicious intention to obliterate the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development, the latter will go over to the resolute action of justice as it had already clarified.
					
					 As the U.S. remain unabated in their mean and heinous provocation, the DPRK will further increase the strength of justice to thoroughly eradicate the cause of war and aggression and never back away from this fight to a finish.

articles.title: Parliamentary Delegation of Nepal Here
articles.content:
Parliamentary Delegation of Nepal Here
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A parliamentary delegation of Nepal led by lawmaker Madav Kumar Nepal, former prime minister of Nepal and honorary chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, arrived here Saturday to attend the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here to Participate in Int'l Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here to Participate in Int'l Festival
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and guests came here on Saturday to attend the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 They are Peter Woods, ambassador of the United Cities and Local Governments-Asia Pacific who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party; Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party; Neil Fitzgerald, co-chairman of the Oceanic Regional Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party; a delegation of the Korean Friendship Association headed by Mana Sapmak; a delegation of the Sri Lanka Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu led by Chairman Pradeep Wijerathnasekara; a delegation of the Finland Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu led by Pekka Kotkasaari; a delegation of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Activists led by Seizaburo Ekuchi; Truong Nam Phuong, representative of the Choson Exchange Association in Singapore; Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee who is chairman of the Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu; Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia Youth Party-Europe Greens who is chairman of the Slovenian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu; Benoit Quennedey, national secretary of the Radical Party of Left of France who is vice-chairman of the French Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party; a delegation of the Ukrainian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu led by Vice-Chairman Nikolai Polishk; a delegation of the Slovak Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu led by Ivan Draxler; Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association; Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwaiti Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification who is chairman of the Kuwaiti Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu; Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico who is chairman of the Mexico Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu; Cati Campos Rontop, secretary general of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru who is representative of the Peruvian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu; and David Denny, chairman of the Barbados Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People who is chairman of the Barbados Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: State Commendations to Contributors to Construction of Ryomyong Street in DPRK
articles.content:
State Commendations to Contributors to Construction of Ryomyong Street in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to officials, servicepersons and builders and officials in the supply units, working citizens and other helpers who made signal contributions to the construction of Ryomyong Street.
					 Servicepersons and builders successfully built Ryomyong Street as a symbol of the great era of Kim Jong Un and an icon and standard of modern architectural street in a matter of nine months.
					
					 Order of Kim Il Sung was conferred on Ri Pang Il, Mun Yong Song, So Kil Bok and Ryu Song Il, Order of Kim Jong Il on Jang Il Su, Ri Chol Su, O Yong Su, Kim Kwang Phil, Jong Yong Nam, Jang Yong Guk and Ri Yong Hwan, the title of Labor Hero on Kim Yong Ho, Kim Sung Bom and other 14 persons, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize on 20 persons and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize on 20 persons.
					
					 Honorary Titles went to 28 persons and orders and medals to 43 119 persons.
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on Thursday.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Visits Farm in Anju City
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Visits Farm in Anju City
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, visited a youth sub-workteam of the Sangso Co-op Farm in Anju City to learn about farming there.
					 Going round farm fields, farm implement storehouse, livestock sheds and a meeting room run by the youth sub-workteam, Choe gave a pep-talk to its members who are working feats, glorifying youth.
					
					 He called on the youth sub-workteam members to further glorify the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who kindled the flame of the youth sub-workteam movement in the countryside and led the movement step by step, and to steadily create fresh miracles and innovations in the spirit of the blizzards of Mt Paektu and the spirit of self-development-first spirit.
					
					 Touring the Anju Youth Sports Apparatus Factory, Choe stressed the need to step up equipment updating and intensify party organizational and political work to produce and supply more sports apparatus.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Start Study Tour of Area of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Start Study Tour of Area of Mt Paektu
Hyesan, August 12 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK had a meeting in front of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province on Saturday to start their study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu.
					 Before the meeting, they placed a floral basket and bouquets at the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim, honorary vice-president of the SPA Presidium, made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 He referred to the fact that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un took a step for the SPA deputies to make a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Reflected in it are the Supreme Leader's deep trust and expectation that all the deputies will creditably discharge their mission and duty in the van of the general offensive for building a powerful socialist nation in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, the speaker added.
					
					 He stressed the need for the deputies to grasp the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great persons associated with Mt Paektu more keenly through the study tour and harden their iron faith and will to accomplish the great cause of Paektu under the guidance of the Supreme Leader.
					
					 After the meeting the deputies went round the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, the Ryanggang Provincial Revolutionary Museum, the Hyesan Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery, etc.

articles.title: Youth and Students Volunteer to Join in Army
articles.content:
Youth and Students Volunteer to Join in Army
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Many working youths, university students and senior middle schoolers in the DPRK have volunteered to join or rejoin in the Korean People's Army after the announcement of the DPRK government statement.
					 Officials of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League took the lead in turning out in the sacred struggle of justice with their surging hatred against the U.S. imperialists who openly revealed the wicked intention to hurt the headquarters of the revolution, not content with wantonly violating the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Women employees of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill and other units across the country pledged to readily turn out in the anti-U.S. sacred war like woman heroines who fought bravely in the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Students of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education and Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry are now filled with the strong will to devotedly protect the headquarters of the revolution and win the final victory in the sacred war against the U.S.
					
					 A large number of youths and students in North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces, too, petitioned to join or rejoin in the army, firmly determined to defeat the U.S. imperialists with arms of Paektusan.
					
					 Hundreds of thousands of students at orphans' secondary schools and senior middle schools across the country, including Chongjin Orphans' Secondary School, Ri Chol Min Senior Middle School in Central District of Pyongyang, Hero Sukchon Senior Middle School in Sukchon County, vowed to go to the military posts for defending the country.

articles.title: Title of May 21 Vanguard Instituted in DPRK
articles.content:
Title of May 21 Vanguard Instituted in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Title of May 21 Vanguard was instituted in the DPRK.
					 On May 21, 1946 after the liberation of Korea, President Kim Il Sung dug the first shovelful of earth at the Pothong River improvement project, thereby unfolding a new history of Juche-based architecture for people.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made public his work "On Architecture" on May 21, 1991, bringing about the era of a great surge in socialist construction with his energetic leadership.
					
					 By successfully carrying forward the preceding leaders' distinguished idea on architecture and their undying exploits for construction, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un created a new history of construction in Korea and is widely guiding a drive to open up the great era of prosperity in construction, a new era of civilization and efflorescence in the 21st century.
					
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK decided to institute the Title of May 21 Vanguard so as to ensure that a movement for catching up with the advanced construction units, learning after them and exchanging experience with them is broadly waged at units in the army and society, and legendary stories about construction glorifying the great era of Kim Jong Un are created one after another, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's far-reaching plan on construction.
					
					 A relevant decree of the SPA Presidium was promulgated on August 10.

articles.title: DPRK People Will Firmly Hold on to Independent Stand
articles.content:
DPRK People Will Firmly Hold on to Independent Stand
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The will of the Korean people to revenge upon the U.S. grows stronger as the days go by with the fabrication of the illegal anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" as an occasion.
					 Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, told KCNA:
					
					 The DPRK's possession of powerful nuclear force is a fair and legitimate self-defensive measure to protect its sovereignty and national right to existence from the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. which has posed nuclear threat to the DPRK for over half a century.  Nevertheless, the U.S. and its servile forces cooked up illegal UN "sanctions resolution", which makes all the people in the DPRK firmly determined to defend their sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 Our people consider "sanctions resolution" nothing, but a scrap of wastepaper.
					
					 Sin Kyong Chol, a department director of the Ministry of Coal Industry, said:
					
					 It is high time to teach the U.S. and its minions how dear price they should have to pay for hurting our inviolable sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 Sovereignty is our life and soul and for nothing it can be bartered.
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges miscalculate that their sanction and pressure could terrify our people. It is our fixed will that a glorious day dedicated to defending the independent dignity is thousand-fold worthier than a slavish life.
					
					 Jo Myong Il, an official of the Ministry of Electronics Industry, said:
					
					 Neither formidable enemy nor harsher sanction can menace our people strong in independent stand.
					
					 We will, as ever, hold faster to the banner of self-reliance and self-development to frustrate the enemy's vicious challenge and speed up the building of a socialist thriving nation with the might of single-hearted unity and Songun.

articles.title: Chongryon Supports Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Chongryon Supports Statement of DPRK Government
Tokyo, August 10 (KNS-KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released a statement on August 9 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The statement expressed full support for the statement of the DPRK government, categorically rejecting the UN "sanctions resolution" cooked up by the U.S.-led hostile forces as a wanton violation and frontal challenge to the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S.-led hostile forces should drop their worn-out hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop the provocations for a nuclear war at once, facing up the national power and dignity of socialist Korea put on the strategic position of a nuclear power and world-class military power of Juche, it said, adding:
					
					 The Japanese authorities crying out for scaling up pressure upon the DPRK while standing in the van of the U.S.-led racket of sanctions and pressure, failing to face up to the present situation where the world political structure has fundamentally changed with the new strategic position of the DPRK, and the south Korean authorities joining in the campaign for slapping sanctions against the compatriots in the north should refrain from their criminal acts against the history and the nation at once.
					
					 The statement expressed the will to turn Chongryon into a creditable and patriotic fortress remaining unfazed by any storm and stress and honorably contribute to the cause of realizing the independent reunification of the country, foiling the U.S.-led hostile forces' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' active pursuance of the U.S. and its vassal forces' "sanctions resolution" reminds one of the conservative group who got hell-bent on the moves to stifle the fellow countrymen, calling for "international cooperation in pressure" its rule, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Saturday.
					 The U.S. ferocious racket for putting sanctions and stifling the DPRK is a product of the criminal strategy for exterminating the Korean nation aimed to put the whole of Korea under its control and make the whole nation its slave in realizing its ambition for dominating the world, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 However, far from thanking the DPRK for steps for bolstering the capabilities for self-defence that guarantee the security of the nation, the south Korean authorities are acting a shock brigade in their master's racket for pressure on the DPRK, calling the steps "threat to international peace".
					
					 Such moves show that their rhetoric about "dialogue" was just sugar-coated words, and they are an open expression of its intention to treat the DPRK as an enemy, not as fellow countrymen.
					
					 Their criminal confrontation racket is an intolerable mockery and an outright challenge to all Koreans wishing for peace of the country and its peaceful reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will never pardon the puppet group resorting to a criminal act of clinging to the coattail of outsiders and pushing the destiny of the nation to a catastrophe by escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities should not run amuck, pondering over the bitter end it can meet by running headlong into the path of treachery just like a blind person unable to properly understand the trend of the times and the principal enemy of the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Jeers S. Korean Puppet FM as Dolt
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Jeers S. Korean Puppet FM as Dolt
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, south Korean puppet Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa at the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum asserted that she "appreciated and thanked for the successful adoption of the UN 'sanctions resolution'" and "the resolution contains very important and substantial contents" and then begged for "international cooperation in pressure on the DPRK".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary slams this as a ridiculous action of dolt who does not know what is the nation's strength and dignity and how peace is defended on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Traitor Kang's deed is little different from the foolish and stupid behaviors made by the conservative regime, it says, adding:
					
					 She should behave with discretion, pondering over what disaster her cynical ploy will bring.
					
					 What awaits the traitor for her frantic confrontation moves in collusion with outside forces will be curse and condemnation by the nation and a worldwide shame.
					
					 She will have to pay dearly for her impudent assertions.

articles.title: Minju Joson Warns U.S. against Military Option
articles.content:
Minju Joson Warns U.S. against Military Option
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Of late, the president and other riffraff of the U.S. are trumpeting about "military option" against the DPRK, claiming that they "will not rule out a war". Meanwhile, they introduce huge strategic nuclear assets into the Korean peninsula, staging reckless nuclear war games and rendering the regional situation extremely tense.
					 In international arena, they get hell-bent on the campaign for sanctions on the DPRK aimed to deprive the DPRK of its rights to development and existence, terming its legitimate steps for self-defence a "serious threat to global peace and security".
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Minju Joson Saturday says it is no more than the last-ditch efforts and hysteric fit of those who are in the grip of despair over being at a loss.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has done all sorts of wrongs to the DPRK, styling itself the "only superpower" in the eyes of the world. But now it finds itself in an ever worsening dilemma, being thrown into the grip of extreme security unrest by the DPRK. This is tragicomedy of its own making.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army of the DPRK capable of fighting any war the U.S. wants is now on the standby to launch fire into its mainland, waiting for an order of final attack.
					
					 If the Trump administration does not want the American empire to meet its tragic doom in its tenure, they had better talk and act properly.
					
					 The U.S. knows better than the DPRK what relationship it should have with the nuclear rival.

articles.title: S. Korea: Stop to Military Provocative Actions Demanded
articles.content:
S. Korea: Stop to Military Provocative Actions Demanded
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- 43 civic organizations in south Korea, including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Bar Association for Democratic Society, called a press conference in Seoul on Thursday to urge the puppet authorities and the U.S. to stop all military actions escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Speakers at the conference said that neither sanctions nor pressure can bring the DPRK to submission.
					
					 They demanded that the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop all war moves against the DPRK, Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military maneuvers soon to be staged in particular, and cancel the THAAD deployment triggering off arms race in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: S. Korea: Authorities Hit for Taking Lead in Implementation of U.S. Anti-DPRK Policy
articles.content:
C. Korea: Authorities Hit for Taking Lead in Implementation of U.S. Anti-DPRK Policy
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The South Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century formed a march group and launched a struggle on August 5 to condemn the puppet authorities and conservative opposition party for taking the lead in enforcing the THAAD deployment and carrying out the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy towards the DPRK, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The group waged an action against THAAD in Songju, Kimchon and other areas of south Korea.
					
					 The head of the group said that the U.S. is chiefly to blame for spawning the deployment of THAAD and sanctions on the north, adding that neither peace of the Korean peninsula nor its reunification can be achieved without the anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 The group plans to wage the struggle outside the U.S. military bases in south Korea till August 15.

articles.title: Korean Youths in Japan Reject UN "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
Korean Youths in Japan Reject UN "Sanctions Resolution"
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, issued a statement on Aug. 9 to reject the UNSC "sanctions resolution" cooked up by the U.S. and other hostile forces over the DPRK's ICBM test-launch.
					 Noting that all the Korean youths and students in Japan are now enraged at the UNSC which adopted another illegal "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK under the manipulation of the U.S., the statement said:
					
					 What is unpardonable is that riffraff raised their hands in support of the "resolution," away from their mission before the world, while reading the face of the U.S.
					
					 The youth league officials and all other Korean youths and students in Japan totally reject the UN "sanctions resolution", cooked up by the U.S. and its vassal forces, and call on the peace-loving world people of conscience to turn out to smash such high-handed and arbitrary practices on the strength of justice and establish a righteous and stable, new world order.

articles.title: Fighter of S. Korean Puppet Army Badly Damaged
articles.content:
Fighter of S. Korean Puppet Army Badly Damaged
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A fighter under the 11th flying corps of the south Korean puppet air force had an accident on August 10, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The F-15K fighter crashed in a landing failure after taking part in a war drill.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo posted "8. The Triumphant Return" from "Chapter 24 Nationwide Resistance against the Japanese" of Vol. 8 (Continuing Edition) of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, and his photo on its website on August 7 on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: DPRK's ICBM Test-launch Hailed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's ICBM Test-launch Hailed by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and websites of Indonesia and DR Congo featured articles observing the DPRK's successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 on August 4 and 5.
					 Indonesia's internet newspaper RMOL said that it has become difficult for the U.S. to take any political countermeasure now that the DPRK possesses ICBM.
					
					 An article titled "Whole U.S. mainland put in range of strike", posted on the website of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, said:
					
					 The DPRK's great success in the second test-fire of Hwasong-14 has plunged the U.S. into the worst nightmare.
					
					 The range of the tested rocket covers the whole U.S. mainland.
					
					 What the U.S. politicians fear is not the ICBM capable of striking the whole mainland only.
					
					 It is that the DPRK is just a country that has a will to most certainly strike the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to win the final victory in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 Cambodia's state radio and Russia's newspapers and websites, including Zavtra, Komsomolskaya Pravda and Irkutskblogspot. Ru, too, commented on the significance of the DPRK's successful ICBM test in the period from July 14 to August 1.

articles.title: U.S. Should Acknowledge DPRK's Strategic Position: Nigerians
articles.content:
U.S. Should Acknowledge DPRK's Strategic Position: Nigerians
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should acknowledge the changed strategic position of the DPRK and come out earlier for dropping its anachronistic hostile policy.
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, said this in a statement on August 2.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The perfect success in the second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 was an event specially recorded in world history. The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people achieved this by consistently adhering to the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, true to the leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un who has carried forward the idea and cause of Songun pioneered by the preceding leaders.
					
					 The success in the test-fire which brought about an invincible treasured sword that can put an end to the decades-long moves of the U.S.-led hostile forces to stifle the DPRK is not only a victory of the Korean people but also a victory common to the world progressives.
					
					 We express full support and solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle for building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 We also call on the world progressive peoples to actively support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana expone la posicion de principios de la RPDC
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana expone la posicion de principios de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la sesion plenaria del tercer periodo de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme, celebrada el dia 9, la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea expuso la posicion de principios sobre los fulminantes exitos en los lanzamientos de dos veces del cohete balistico intercontinental de tipo "Hwasong-14".
					La posesion de las poderosas fuerzas armadas nucleares por parte de la RPDC es una justa medida autodefensiva optada para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a subsistencia nacional desde el despotismo y la arbitrariedad de EE.UU. que vino cometiendo durante mas de medio siglo la extremada politica hostil a la RPDC y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares, senalo la delegacion coreana y prosiguio:
					
					Los sucesivos lanzamientos del cohete balistico intercontinental constituyen una seria advertencia a EE.UU que sigue valiendose de la imprudente aventura militar y la sucia campana de sanciones.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, la RPDC jamas pondra sobre la mesa de negociaciones su disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo ni retrocedera ni un paso atras en el camino de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares ya escogido mientras que prosiguen las tentativas anti-RPDC y la amenaza nuclear del imperio norteamericano.
					
					Ya que EE.UU. ha expuesto su perversa voluntad de acabar con la soberania y los derechos a subsistencia y al desarrollo de la RPDC, esta tomara las acciones resueltas y justas como ya habia aclarado.
					
					Para enfrentarse a las ininterrumpidas provocaciones aviesas y viles de EE.UU., la RPDC centuplicara aun mas su fuerza de justicia para extirpar la causa raigal de la agresion y la guerra y pondra punto final a la confrontacion.

articles.title: Llega a Pyongyang la delegacion nepalesa
articles.content:
Llega a Pyongyang la delegacion nepalesa
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- Para participar en el V Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu, llego el dia 12 a esta capital la delegacion de la Asamblea Nacional de Nepal, encabezada por el ex premier nepales, Madav Kumar Nepal, quien es parlamentario y presidente honorario del Comite Preparatorio Internacional para el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017.

articles.title: Condecorados los ameritados en la construccion de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Condecorados los ameritados en la construccion de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedaron conferidas las condecoraciones del Estado a los funcionarios, militares y constructores, los funcionarios y trabajadores de las unidades asistentes y a los voluntarios que hicieron mucho aporte a la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong.
					Los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los constructores construyeron esa avenida en solo 9 meses como simbolo de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un y modelo de las avenidas modernas.
					
					La Orden Kim Il Sung fue otorgada a Ri Pang Il, Mun Yong Song, So Kil Bok y Ryu Song Il; la Orden Kim Jong Il a Jang Il Su, Ri Chol Su, O Yong Su, Kim Kwang Phil, Jong Yong Nam, Jang Yong Guk y Ri Yong Hwan; el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo a Kim Yong Ho, Kim Sung Bom y otras 14 personas; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung a 20 personas; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il a otras 20.
					
					Los titulos de honor fueron concedidos a 28 y las ordenes y medallas a 43 mil 119.
					
					Se ha publicado el dia 10 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae visita la Granja Cooperativa de Sangso
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae visita la Granja Cooperativa de Sangso
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, averiguo en el terreno como marchan las faenas agricolas del subequipo juvenil de la Granja Cooperativa de Sangso de la ciudad de Anju.
					Recorriendo las parcelas, el almacen de aparatos agricolas, el corral y otras partes, Choe estimulo a los miembros del subequipo que trabajan coronando con meritos su juventud.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de glorificar las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quienes dieron inicio al movimiento del subequipo juvenil en el campo y lo condujeron atentamente, y crear sin cesar nuevos milagros e innovaciones con el espiritu del viento cortante del monte Paektu y el de autofortalecimiento.
					
					Acto seguido, el visito la Fabrica de Aparatos Deportivos Juventud de Anju donde destaco la necesidad de intensificar la labor organizativa y politica del partido a fin de modernizar los equipos y producir mucho mas los articulos deportivos que puedan aumentar el fervor deportivo en todo el pais.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes coreanos piden el servicio militar
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes coreanos piden el servicio militar
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- Despues de publicada la declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los jovenes trabajadores y los estudiantes de las universidades y escuelas secundarias superiores a lo largo del pais expresan la voluntad de incorporarse al Ejercito Popular de Corea o repetir el servicio militar.
					Al frente de ellos estan los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista quienes redoblan la decision de vengarse de los imperialistas norteamericanos que insatisfechos de sus atentados flagrantes contra la soberania de la RPDC, exponen abiertamente su siniestro intento de eliminar la Direccion Suprema de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Las jovenes de diferentes localidades, inclusive la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, deciden hacerse An Yong Ae y Jo Ok Hui (heroinas de la pasada guerra coreana) en la sagrada guerra antiyanqui de hoy.
					
					Los estudiantes de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik y la Universidad de Industria Ligera Han Tok Su de Pyongyang mantienen el animo por extender los grandes acontecimientos de julio a la victoria final defendiendo a ultranza la Direccion Suprema de la revolucion.
					
					Muchos jovenes y estudiantes de las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, Hwanghae del Norte y Hamgyong del Sur solicitan el servicio militar para exterminar a los imperialistas yanquis con los fusiles del monte Paektu.
					
					Manifestaron la misma decision cientos de miles de alumnos de las escuelas secundarias de internado y las otras superiores a lo largo del pais, inclusive la Escuela Secundaria de Internado de Chongjin y la Escuela Secundaria Superior Ri Chol Min del capitalino municipio de Jung.
